Detailed Description

State of a polyphonic MIDI sequence.

int  phrasein = 0,

)

Create a MIDI state from list of notes and data.

The virtual fondamental pitch vpitch is computed on the notes as well as the mean velocity

Remarks:
All the following arguments are passed to the O_label constructor
